OOC: Whee another note, Drillbit couldnt lock onto the cannons 
anyways. The Violator has stealth so no systems can lock onto it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He rolls out of the way of the two laser blasts. He then sees 
Cygnar and
> others pulling out.
> "What the hell!" He screams. He opens his comm to them.
> "Get back here! Those cannons are nothing to worry about. 
Concentrait
> your fire on them, and destroy them first. Then move on."
> He locks on to one of the four cannons and opens fire. It would not 
take
> long for his gattaling gun to take it out.
